questions.question: Has a visual inspection been completed?

prompt.text: List of defects and remedial action taken

Open all main switches

no.error: Cannot proceed until all main switches are open

no.error: Cannot proceed until all circuit breakers are turned off

sections.title: Polarity Test on Mains (with Supply available)

questions.question: Is the Main Switch and all the circuit breakers turned OFF?

no.error: Can not proceed until Main Switch and all circuit breakers are turned OFF

no.error: Can not proceed until the main neutral and main earth are removed from neutral link

no.error: Can not proceed until main earth and main neutral have been reconnected to main neutral link

questions.question: Test for indication at service bonding conductor and riser bracket using proximity tester)

no.error: Service bonding conductor and riser bracket appear to be energised – Check supply connections

questions.question: Test for indication at main earth electrode using proximity tester)

yes.error: Main earthing conductor appears to be energised – Check supply connections

no.error: Check and resolve MEN connection to proceed

no.error: Check and resolve main earth connection to electrode to proceed

invalid.eror: Can not proceed until description about item or circuit being tested is entered

invalid.eror: Can not proceed until value is entered

questions.question: Testing Another item or circuit?
Is the item and/or circuit include fixed heating elements?
Test between the item earth and active/neutral conductors or for a circuit between the earthing bar and the circuit active and neutral conductors (must be over 1M ohm)

invalid.eror: Can not proceed until insulation resistance measurement is entered

no.error: Can not proceed until incorrect polarity is resolved

questions.question: Test RCD/Safety switch button of circuit, did it function correctly?

no.error: Can not proceed until safety switch is working correctly

questions.question: Test RCD/Safety switch of circuit, using RCD Tester, did it function correctly?

no.error: Can not proceed until safety switch is working correctly
